SELECT S.SHOP_ID,S.SHOP_CODE,S.SHOP_NAME,S.MCHNT_ID,M.MCHNT_NAME,INS.INS_NAME, S.COUNTRY,S.PROVINCE,S.CITY,S.DISTRICT,S.STREET,S.LONGITUDE,S.LATITUDE,S.GEOHASH,S.SHOP_ADDR, S.TELEPHONE,S.EVALUATE,S.BUSINESS_HOURS,S.DATA_STAT,S.QR_CODE_URL,S.SELL_CARD_FLAG,S.SHOP_TYPE,S.REMARKS, S.CREATE_USER,S.UPDATE_USER,S.CREATE_TIME,S.UPDATE_TIME,S.LOCK_VERSION FROM TB_SHOP_INF S LEFT JOIN TB_MERCHANT_INF M ON S.MCHNT_ID = M.MCHNT_ID LEFT JOIN TB_INS_INF INS ON M.INS_ID = INS.INS_ID WHERE S.DATA_STAT = 0
AND SYSDATE-1/24 <= S.UPDATE_TIME
